author: chriswhinfrey
content:
Hey folks, We're a small team working on cross-rollup composability. We just shared a paper on Hop, a protocol that lets you trustlessly transfer tokens directly from one rollup to another rollup. Hop also enables fast exits from rollups to Ethereum.

https://ethresear.ch/t/hop-send-tokens-across-rollups/8581

Would really appreciate any and all feedback on the design.
Checkout the demo here: https://hop.exchange
